modName: Simple Fire DoT Spells and improved Flamecloak
summary: Adds 4 Spells to the game that cause burn damage
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a chest in the Riverwood Trader, upstairs on a table.
This chest contains 4 spells, which visuals are like vanilla spells.
It comes in two versions. A normal one designed for endgame. And a weakened one.
Their effects are;


Normal Version
Burn -> 25 Fire damage over 7 seconds
Inferno -> 100 Fire damage over 10 seconds
Pyroblast-> 50 Fire Damage over 12 seconds
Mastered Flamecloak -> 25 Fire damage to melee targets, +35% health regeneration, +50% frost resistance , +25% destruction power

Weakened Version
Burn -> 13 Fire damage over 5 seconds
Inferno -> 45 Fire damage over 10 seconds
Pyroblast -> 25 Fire damage over 12 seconds
Mastered Flamecloak -> 12 Fire damage to melee targets, +50% health regeneration, 65% frost resistance, +30% destruction power

The reason for the different bonuses for the Flamecloak? Easy. I think in lower levels or in different game setups it might be more usefull to have a bit more defense instead of damage.
author: Tzunamii25 aka ViperEX
